parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the de-identification task. You can query the task ID by calling the [DescribeDataMaskingTasks](~~DescribeDataMaskingTasks~~) operation.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh_cn**: Simplified Chinese (default)
*   **en_us**: English
